languages.text: Когда обстановка разрядится, а следы бойни будут устранены, следует осведомиться о состоянии ксеноса.

traits.locale_text: Когда обстановка разрядится, а следы бойни будут устранены, следует осведомиться о состоянии ксеноса.

languages.text: Once the tensions have eased and the aftermath of the carnage has been alleviated, the Lord Captain should enquire about the xenos's state of mind.
languages.original_text: Когда обстановка разрядится, а следы бойни будут устранены, следует осведомиться о состоянии ксеноса.

traits.locale_text: Once the tensions have eased and the aftermath of the carnage has been alleviated, the Lord Captain will be advised to enquire about the xenos's state of mind.
Once the tensions have eased and the aftermath of the carnage has been alleviated, the Lord Captain will be advised to enquire about the xenos's state of mind.
Once the tensions have eased and the aftermath of the carnage has been alleviated, the Lord Captain should enquire about the xenos's state of mind.
Once the tensions have eased and the aftermath of the carnage has been alleviated, the Lord Captain should enquire about the xenos's state of mind.

languages.text: Lorsque les tensions se seront apaisées et que les conséquences du carnage auront été mitigées, {mf|le seigneur-capitaine|la seigneure-capitaine} devrait s'enquérir de l'état d'esprit du xénos.
languages.original_text: Once the tensions have eased and the aftermath of the carnage has been alleviated, the Lord Captain should enquire about the xenos's state of mind.

traits.locale_text: Lorsque les tensions se seront apaisées et que les conséquences du carnage auront été mitigées, {mf|le seigneur-capitaine|la seigneure-capitaine} devrait s'enquérir de l'état d'esprit du xénos.

languages.text: 紧张局势得到了缓和，玛拉斋也从大屠杀的疯狂中清醒过来。行商浪人需要弄清楚玛拉斋此刻的精神状态。
languages.original_text: Once the tensions have eased and the aftermath of the carnage has been alleviated, the Lord Captain should enquire about the xenos's state of mind.

traits.locale_text: 紧张局势得到了缓和，玛拉斋也从大屠杀的疯狂中清醒过来。行商浪人需要弄清楚玛拉斋此刻的精神状态。

languages.text: 緊張状態が緩和し大虐殺の余波が静まれば、ロード・キャプテンは異種族の心理的状態について調査すべきだろう。
languages.original_text: Once the tensions have eased and the aftermath of the carnage has been alleviated, the Lord Captain should enquire about the xenos's state of mind.

traits.locale_text: 緊張状態が緩和し大虐殺の余波が静まれば、ロード・キャプテンは異種族の心理的状態について調査すべきだろう。

languages.text: Sobald die Spannungen nachgelassen haben und die Folgen des Blutbads beseitigt sind, sollte der Lord Captain sich nach dem Geisteszustand des Xenos erkundigen.
languages.original_text: Once the tensions have eased and the aftermath of the carnage has been alleviated, the Lord Captain should enquire about the xenos's state of mind.

traits.locale_text: Sobald die Spannungen nachgelassen haben und die Folgen des Blutbads beseitigt sind, sollte der Lord Captain sich nach dem Geisteszustand des Xenos erkundigen.

languages.text: Tras aliviar las tensiones y ocuparse de los restos de la masacre, {mf|el|la} Lord Capitán debería averiguar el estado mental del xenos.
languages.original_text: Once the tensions have eased and the aftermath of the carnage has been alleviated, the Lord Captain should enquire about the xenos's state of mind.

traits.locale_text: Tras aliviar las tensiones y ocuparse de los restos de la masacre, {mf|el|la} Lord Capitán debería averiguar el estado mental del xenos.

languages.text: Katliamın yol açtığı gerginlik ortadan kaldırıldıktan sonra Lord Kaptan, zenonun ruhsal durumunu sorgulamalı.
languages.original_text: Once the tensions have eased and the aftermath of the carnage has been alleviated, the Lord Captain should enquire about the xenos's state of mind.
